org.codehaus.preon.codec
Class BindingsContext

java.lang.Object
  org.codehaus.preon.codec.BindingsContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
Descriptive, ObjectResolverContext, ReferenceContext<Resolver>, ResolverContext
public class BindingsContext
extends Object
implements ObjectResolverContext

A ResolverContext based on a collection of Bindings.

Author:
Wilfred Springer (wis)

selectAttribute

public Reference<Resolver> selectAttribute(String name)
                                    throws BindingException
Description copied from interface: ReferenceContext
Creates a new Reference; the new Reference will be resolved by first resolving the current reference, and then use the name to navigate to another object associated to that object.

Specified by:
selectAttribute in interface ReferenceContext<Resolver>
Parameters:
name - The name to be used to resolve the Reference.
Returns:
A new Reference, pointing to the object that is related to the original object by the given name.
Throws:
BindingException
